title: 100 Hidden Truths of Parenting
description: The Hidden Truths of Parenting are the reckless rants of an overrun parent. Mixing acute observations with a healthy dose of humor no parent will fail to recognize, this book is both hilarious and true. There is no advice whatsoever here; at least not ones you will want to follow. But this book may very well save your sanity, or at least, provide you with the small comfort of commiseration.
author: Ohad Ouziel
